statements: SELECT * FROM user_access_control_list WHERE granted = TRUE
SELECT user_id, resource_name FROM user_access_control_list WHERE permission_type = 'read'
SELECT * FROM user_access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_access_control_list WHERE granted = FALSE
SELECT * FROM user_access_control_list ORDER BY resource_name ASC
SELECT user_id, resource_name, permission_type, granted FROM user_access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control_list WHERE permission_type = 'READ' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, resource_name FROM user_access_control_list WHERE granted = TRUE AND resource_name LIKE '%document%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT permission_type FROM user_access_control_list WHERE resource_name = 'file.doc';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM user_access_control_list WHERE resource_name = 'folder' AND granted = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 50 LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM resources WHERE resource_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT role_id, user_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id < 50 ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT role_id, user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND user_id > 50;
SELECT * FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, email, password FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE id = 3;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, description FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'database';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role='Admin';

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.grant_type FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id JOIN roles r ON p.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT r.role_name, COUNT(up.user_id) AS num_users FROM roles r LEFT JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.role_id LEFT JOIN user_permissions up ON p.permission_id = up.permission_id GROUP BY r.role_name;

SELECT u.username, p.grant_type, r.resource_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id JOIN resources r ON p.resource_id = r.resource_id WHERE u.username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY r.resource_name DESC;
